sql.mysql: SELECT r.ID, r.SUPERVISION_UNIT, r.SUPERVISED_UNIT, r.SUPERVISION_CONTENT, r.INSERT_TIME, r.PUBLISH_STATE, r.RECTIFICATION_ENDDATE, r.RECTIFICATION_FEEDBACK, r.RECTIFICATION_STARTDATE, r.RECTIFICATION_STATE, r.STATE, r.SUPERVISED_FAX, r.SUPERVISED_PHONE, r.SUPERVISION_ENDDATE, r.SUPERVISION_FAX, r.SUPERVISION_PHONE, r.SUPERVISION_STARTDATE, r.WORK_SUGGESTION FROM rectification_notice r WHERE r.PUBLISH_STATE = '0' ${filters} ORDER BY r.INSERT_TIME

SELECT ID, QUESTION, RECTIFICATION_REQUIR, RECTIFICATION_DEADLINE, RECTIFICATION_STATE, INSERT_TIME, UPDATE_USER, UPDATE_TIME FROM rectification_question WHERE RECTIFICATION_ID =:id ORDER BY RECTIFICATION_STATE

SELECT ID, SUPERVISION_UNIT, SUPERVISION_CONTENT, STATE, RECTIFICATION_STATE, RECTIFICATION_STARTDATE, RECTIFICATION_ENDDATE FROM rectification_notice WHERE SUPERVISED_UNIT = :unitId ${filters} ORDER BY INSERT_TIME
